meanings.definition: A device used to measure the rate of flow of a liquid or gas.
meanings.sent1: The flowmeter showed how fast the water was moving in the pipe.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the flowmeter to monitor the gas flow in the system.
meanings.sent3: The flowmeter seemed to be playing a game of guessing the speed of the liquid.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a flowmeter, always tracking the movement of people around her.
meanings.sent5: The flowmeter hummed softly as it calculated the flow rate with precision.

meanings.definition: To measure the flow rate of a fluid using a flowmeter.
meanings.sent1: He will flowmeter the liquid to determine its speed.
meanings.sent2: They need to flowmeter the gas flow to ensure efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The scientist decided to flowmeter the river just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She flowmetered the data like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: Flowmetering the flow of information can help in making better decisions.
